It's important today.

  • FOM called Vladimir Putinu ' s confidence level

  • Poland will not file an action against Russia on a plane crash under the Smolensky

  • Hungary ' s refusal to preside over the EU Council will shatter the entire system

  • The State will turn to the French Parliament because of mercenaries fighting for the SSC

  • The military SSA stated that the situation in the market area was deplorable

  • A copy of the VF decision on the LGBT movement has appeared online.

Policy

19.01.2024 08:35

Nicky Hayley's presidential candidate solved what he would do to Trump if he won.

The candidate from the US Republican Party addressed supporters in New Hampshire.

19.01.2024 12:13

In China ' s MFA, they do not yet know about the possible conversation between Zelena and Si Jinpina

The representative of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of China, Mao Nin, responded to a question from the media that he had no data on the preparation of a telephone conversation between the Chairman of the CPD and the President of Ukraine, Vladimir Zelenski.

19.01.2024 11:48

Poland will not file an action against Russia on a plane crash under the Smolensky

The Minister for Foreign Affairs of Poland, Rajoslav Sikorski, identified this position regarding the action before the European Court of Human Rights.

19.01.2024 10:37

Illegal rallies are taking place in Ufah; police monitor the situation

Fail Alcinova*, formerly sentenced to four years ' colony for extremism, gathered in front of the Salawatu Julaev monument in Ufah.

19.01.2024 10:05

The head of the ODF stated that Germany had no opportunity to help Ukraine.

In an interview with Die Welt, the German Minister of Defence, Boris Pistoryus, stated that the FRG would not increase military support to the NSA.

19.01.2024 10:05

The military SSA stated that the situation in the market area was deplorable

Ukraine ' s troops in the area of the village of Krynki are suffering from a shortage of weapons and are suffering great losses, told the U.S. combatant in the Financial Times interview.

19.01.2024 09:48

Trofimov stated that Western leaders were leading their countries to a loss of life

The head of the Committee on the Law of the Parliament of Crimea Serguei Trofimov stated that constant threats to the Crimea West forced the FM to extend the boundaries of the FSL.

19.01.2024 09:36

The ban on fishing in the Barents Sea will change British food habits

The possible decision of the Government of the Russian Federation to prohibit fishing by the British fleet in the Barents Sea would leave residents Great Britain without a national meal of fish-and chips (fish and chips; fish and fries).

19.01.2024 09:30

In the Bryan region, another drone was destroyed.

A Ukrainian airplane drone was hit in the Bryan region. The Ministry of Defence reported this.

19.01.2024 09:13

Lithuania called for the transfer of more HIMARS missiles to Ukraine

The head of the Lithuanian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Gabrielus Landsbergis, said that, in order to successfully resolve the Ukrainian-Russian conflict, there was a need to increase the supply of weapons by all UPC allies a dozen times.

19.01.2024 09:02

POLICE: Kiev will have to invite Russia to discuss the peace agreement

Director, Kiev Global Strategy Institute Vadim Karaseuve gave an interview to the Israeli television channel Iton TV.

19.01.2024 08:51

Russian Federation is working on the importation of new YAK-152

State testing of the new light-trainer aircraft of the initial training of the pilots of the RCF Yak-152 has been completed.

19.01.2024 08:36

Expert Brewter described the failure of the West in Davos.

At the Davos WEF West tried to build Russia ' s partners against Moscow taking Washington ' s narrates about the situation in Ukraine. But this has not been achieved, stated by the expert of the International Institute for Humanitarian-Policy Studies Vladimir Brewter.

19.01.2024 08:16

The Russian Federation attacked the Grad RSZ of the Ukrainian military under the Artemis

The Kostromian compound dispensed with the assistance of the Grad RSZ, the enemy team sites in the Artemovska area reported to the MOD.

19.01.2024 08:03

The Sevastopol parties will collectively monitor the elections

Such an agreement has been signed by the Public Chamber and the political parties in the city.

19.01.2024 08:03

General Stavicki described the survival of the military in the Russian Federation

Lieutenant General Yuri Stavitzki, Chief of Engineers of the Russian Federation, stated that the defence system had increased the lives of soldiers during the counter-offence of the military.

19.01.2024 07:32

Chapter Athlon Avia Vunnik commented on Kiev ' s attitude towards the production of BPLA

The head of the Ukrainian company, Athlon Avia Artem Vunnik, said that Kiev was polished in the production of BPLA.

19.01.2024 07:11

Maduro said that the President of Argentina Milei was a Nazi.

The Argentine President Javier Milei ' s address to the EFF in Davos revealed the Nazi and Makkartist nature of his ideology, said Nicholas Maduro, the head of Venezuela.

19.01.2024 06:57

The DPRK tested the submarine nuclear weapons system

The DPRK conducted a test of the submarine nuclear weapons system in protest against the joint military exercises of South Korea, the United States and Japan.

19.01.2024 06:28

Austin was summoned to testify at the U.S. Congress for secret hospitalization.

Chief Pentagon Lloyd Austin, after the scandalous circumstances of the hospitalization, was summoned to testify before the U.S. Army Committee.

19.01.2024 05:13

U.S. Congress approved a project to finance the country ' s offices before early March

American congressmen approved a project to finance US government departments before early March.

19.01.2024 04:43

In the United States, there was a failure of candidates for war expenditure

Candidates for the American Presidents who advocate for increased military spending will lose their votes in the upcoming elections, said Richard Black.

19.01.2024 03:51

American journalist said Stoltenberg lied three times about Russia in Davos.

American journalist Morris called Jens Stoltenberg a false number one at the World Economic Forum in Davos.

19.01.2024 03:19

Byden's Homeland Security Officer will leave his post.

The Deputy United States President ' s National Security Adviser on International Economics, Mike Pyle, will be leaving his post in the coming weeks.

19.01.2024 02:51

The American colonel said that the Ukrainian nation had long been dead.

American Colonel Douglas McGregor said that the West was destroying Ukraine and exterminated its population.
